name: Prolimatech PK-1 1.5 g Thermal Paste
Features: [Excellent long-term stability, Not electrically conductive, Non-corrosive, Easy to apply and less to use, No "burn-in" time required, Low dry-out, Material Specification: Al 60~85(wt%), ZnO 15~25(wt%), Oil 12~20(wt%), Antioxidant 0.5~2(wt%), Adhesiveness: 310000Cps, Thermal Conductivity:10.2 W/m - degrees, Thermal Impedance: 0.017 degrees -in2/W, Included: One syringe of thermal compound and one easy-to-spread card., Specific Gravity: 3.2g/cubic centimeter]
